verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <WH1696> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> 'a-le-Hem; about אֲנִ֖י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto them I am the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֧ה <WH4639> ke-ma-'a-Seh After the doings אֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> 'e-retz- of the land מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher where יְשַׁבְתֶּם־ <WH3427> ye-shav-tem- wherein ye dwelt בָּ֖הּ bah לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor תַעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> ta-'a-Su; shall ye not do וּכְמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> u-che-ma-'a-Seh and after the doings אֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> 'e-retz- of the land כְּנַ֡עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an of Canaan אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher where אֲנִי֩ <WH589> 'a-Ni I am מֵבִ֨יא <WH935> me-Vi whither I bring אֶתְכֶ֥ם <WH853> 'et-Chem שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> Sham-mah in it לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor תַעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> ta-'a-Su, you shall ye not do וּבְחֻקֹּתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH2708> u-ve-chuk-ko-tei-Hem in their ordinances לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo nor תֵלֵֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> te-Le-chu. walk

אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִשְׁפָּטַ֧י <WH4941> mish-pa-Tai my judgments תַּעֲשׂ֛וּ <WH6213> ta-'a-Su Ye shall do וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et חֻקֹּתַ֥י <WH2708> chuk-ko-Tai mine ordinances תִּשְׁמְר֖וּ <WH8104> tish-me-Ru and keep לָלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> la-Le-chet to live בָּהֶ֑ם ba-Hem; אֲנִ֖י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh therein I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֤ם <WH8104> u-she-mar-Tem Ye shall therefore keep אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֻקֹּתַי֙ <WH2708> chuk-ko-Tai my statutes וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִשְׁפָּטַ֔י <WH4941> mish-pa-Tai, and my judgments אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> ya-'a-Seh do אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> 'o-Tam הָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> ha-'a-Dam if a man וָחַ֣י <WH2425> va-Chai he shall live בָּהֶ֑ם ba-Hem; אֲנִ֖י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. in them I [am] the LORD ס sa-Mek

אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish to any אִישׁ֙ <WH376> 'ish he אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- any שְׁאֵ֣ר <WH7607> she-'Er that is near בְּשָׂר֔וֹ <WH1320> be-sa-Ro, of kin לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not תִקְרְב֖וּ <WH7126> tik-re-Vu None of you shall approach לְגַלּ֣וֹת <WH1540> le-gal-Lot to him to uncover עֶרְוָ֑ה <WH6172> 'er-Vah; [their] nakedness אֲנִ֖י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh. God ס sa-Mek

עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> 'er-Vat The nakedness אָבִ֛יךָ <WH1> 'a-Vi-cha of thy father וְעֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> ve-'er-Vat or the nakedness אִמְּךָ֖ <WH517> 'im-me-Cha of thy mother לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo shall not תְגַלֵּ֑ה <WH1540> te-gal-Leh; shalt thou not uncover אִמְּךָ֣ <WH517> 'im-me-Cha she [is] thy mother הִ֔וא <WH1931> hi he לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo are not תְגַלֶּ֖ה <WH1540> te-gal-Leh thou shalt not uncover עֶרְוָתָֽהּ׃ <WH6172> 'er-va-Tah. her nakedness ס sa-Mek

עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> 'er-Vat The nakedness אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> 'e-shet- wife אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> 'a-Vi-cha of thy father's לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo shall not תְגַלֵּ֑ה <WH1540> te-gal-Leh; shalt thou not uncover עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> 'er-Vat nakedness אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> 'a-Vi-cha it [is] thy father's הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> hi he ס sa-Mek

[even] their nakedness ס sa-Mek

עֶרְוַ֤ת <WH6172> 'er-Vat The nakedness בַּת־ <WH1323> bat- daughter בִּנְךָ֙ <WH1121> bin-Cha of thy son's א֣וֹ <WH176> o or בַֽת־ <WH1323> vat- or of thy daughter's בִּתְּךָ֔ <WH1323> bit-te-Cha, daughter לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo shall not תְגַלֶּ֖ה <WH1540> te-gal-Leh thou shalt not uncover עֶרְוָתָ֑ן <WH6172> 'er-va-Tan; [even] their nakedness כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for עֶרְוָתְךָ֖ <WH6172> 'er-va-te-Cha [is] thine own nakedness הֵֽנָּה׃ <WH2007> Hen-nah. for theirs ס sa-Mek

עֶרְוַ֨ת <WH6172> 'er-Vat The nakedness בַּת־ <WH1323> bat- daughter אֵ֤שֶׁת <WH802> 'E-shet wife's אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> 'a-Vi-cha of thy father's מוֹלֶ֣דֶת <WH4138> mo-Le-det begotten אָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> 'a-Vi-cha, of thy father אֲחוֹתְךָ֖ <WH269> 'a-chot-Cha she [is] thy sister הִ֑וא <WH1931> hi he לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo shall not תְגַלֶּ֖ה <WH1540> te-gal-Leh thou shalt not uncover עֶרְוָתָֽהּ׃ <WH6172> 'er-va-Tah. her nakedness ס sa-Mek

עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> 'er-Vat the nakedness אֲחוֹת־ <WH269> 'a-chot- sister אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> 'a-Vi-cha of thy father's לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo shall not תְגַלֵּ֑ה <WH1540> te-gal-Leh; Thou shalt not uncover שְׁאֵ֥ר <WH7607> she-'Er near kinswoman אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> 'a-Vi-cha she [is] thy father's הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> hi he ס sa-Mek

עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> 'er-Vat the nakedness כַּלָּֽתְךָ֖ <WH3618> kal-la-te-Cha of thy daughter in law לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo shall not תְגַלֵּ֑ה <WH1540> te-gal-Leh; Thou shalt not uncover אֵ֤שֶׁת <WH802> 'E-shet wife בִּנְךָ֙ <WH1121> bin-Cha she [is] thy son's הִ֔וא <WH1931> hi he לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo shall not תְגַלֶּ֖ה <WH1540> te-gal-Leh thou shalt not uncover עֶרְוָתָֽהּ׃ <WH6172> 'er-va-Tah. her nakedness ס sa-Mek

עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> 'er-Vat the nakedness אִשָּׁ֛ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah of a woman וּבִתָּ֖הּ <WH1323> u-vit-Tah and her daughter לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor תְגַלֵּ֑ה <WH1540> te-gal-Leh; Thou shalt not uncover אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- בַּת־ <WH1323> bat- daughter בְּנָ֞הּ <WH1121> be-Nah her son's וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בַּת־ <WH1323> bat- or her daughter's בִּתָּ֗הּ <WH1323> bit-Tah, daughter לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo nor תִקַּח֙ <WH3947> tik-Kach neither shalt thou take לְגַלּ֣וֹת <WH1540> le-gal-Lot to uncover עֶרְוָתָ֔הּ <WH6172> 'er-va-Tah, her nakedness שַׁאֲרָ֥ה <WH7608> sha-'a-Rah [for] they [are] her near kinswomen הֵ֖נָּה <WH2007> Hen-nah in זִמָּ֥ה <WH2154> zim-Mah it [is] wickedness הִֽוא <WH1931> hi he

וְאִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> ve-'ish-Shah a wife אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- addition אֲחֹתָ֖הּ <WH269> 'a-cho-Tah to her sister לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo shall not תִקָּ֑ח <WH3947> tik-Kach; Neither shalt thou take לִצְרֹ֗ר <WH6887> litz-Ror, to vex לְגַלּ֧וֹת <WH1540> le-gal-Lot [her] to uncover עֶרְוָתָ֛הּ <WH6172> 'er-va-Tah her nakedness עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-ha in בְּחַיֶּֽיהָ׃ <WH2416> be-chai-Yei-ha. beside the other in her life

וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- about אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah unto a woman בְּנִדַּ֣ת <WH5079> be-nid-Dat as long as she is put apart טֻמְאָתָ֑הּ <WH2932> tum-'a-Tah; for her uncleanness לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo shall not תִקְרַ֔ב <WH7126> tik-Rav, Also thou shalt not approach לְגַלּ֖וֹת <WH1540> le-gal-Lot to uncover עֶרְוָתָֽהּ׃ <WH6172> 'er-va-Tah. her nakedness

וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- about אֵ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH802> 'e-shet wife עֲמִֽיתְךָ֔ <WH5997> 'a-mi-te-Cha, with thy neighbour's לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> tit-Ten Moreover thou shalt not שְׁכָבְתְּךָ֖ <WH7903> she-cha-ve-te-Cha lie לְזָ֑רַע <WH2233> le-Za-ra'; carnally לְטָמְאָה־ <WH2930> le-ta-me-'ah- to defile בָֽהּ׃ Vah.

וּמִֽזַּרְעֲךָ֥ <WH2233> u-miz-zar-'a-Cha let any of thy seed לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- nor תִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> tit-Ten And thou shalt not לְהַעֲבִ֣יר <WH5674> le-ha-'a-Vir pass לַמֹּ֑לֶךְ <WH4432> lam-Mo-lech; through [the fire] to Molech וְלֹ֧א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor תְחַלֵּ֛ל <WH2490> te-chal-Lel neither shalt thou profane אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> shem the name אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha of thy God אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. I [am] the LORD

וְאֶ֨ת־ <WH854> ve-'Et with זָכָ֔ר <WH2145> za-Char, with mankind לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo shall not תִשְׁכַּ֖ב <WH7901> tish-Kav Thou shalt not lie מִשְׁכְּבֵ֣י <WH4904> mish-ke-Vei as with אִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah; womankind תּוֹעֵבָ֖ה <WH8441> to-'e-Vah it [is] abomination הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> hi he

וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> u-ve-Chol any בְּהֵמָ֛ה <WH929> be-he-Mah with any beast לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- nor תִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> tit-Ten Neither shalt thou שְׁכָבְתְּךָ֖ <WH7903> she-cha-ve-te-Cha lie לְטָמְאָה־ <WH2930> le-ta-me-'ah- to defile בָ֑הּ Vah; וְאִשָּׁ֗ה <WH802> ve-'ish-Shah, thyself therewith neither shall any woman לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- nor תַעֲמֹ֞ד <WH5975> ta-'a-Mod stand לִפְנֵ֧י <WH6440> lif-Nei before בְהֵמָ֛ה <WH929> ve-he-Mah a beast לְרִבְעָ֖הּ <WH7250> le-riv-'Ah to lie down תֶּ֥בֶל <WH8397> Te-vel thereto it [is] confusion הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. he

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּֽטַּמְּא֖וּ <WH2930> tit-tam-me-'U Defile בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol any אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh; not ye yourselves in any of these things כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki by בְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol- all אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> 'el-leh things נִטְמְא֣וּ <WH2930> nit-me-'U are defiled הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim, for in all these the nations אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am מְשַׁלֵּ֖חַ <WH7971> me-shal-Le-ach which I cast out מִפְּנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH6440> mip-pe-nei-Chem. before

וַתִּטְמָ֣א <WH2930> vat-tit-Ma is defiled הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, And the land וָאֶפְקֹ֥ד <WH6485> va-'ef-Kod therefore I do visit עֲוֹנָ֖הּ <WH5771> 'a-vo-Nah the iniquity עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-ha; and וַתָּקִ֥א <WH6958> vat-ta-Ki itself vomiteth out הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz thereof upon it and the land אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יֹשְׁבֶֽיהָ׃ <WH3427> yo-she-Vei-ha. her inhabitants

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֣ם <WH8104> u-she-mar-Tem Ye shall therefore keep אַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> 'at-Tem, you אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֻקֹּתַי֙ <WH2708> chuk-ko-Tai my statutes וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִשְׁפָּטַ֔י <WH4941> mish-pa-Tai, and my judgments וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo and shall not תַעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> ta-'a-Su, and shall not commit מִכֹּ֥ל <WH3605> mik-Kol all manner הַתּוֹעֵבֹ֖ת <WH8441> hat-to-'e-Vot [any] of these abominations הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh; of these הָֽאֶזְרָ֔ח <WH249> ha-'ez-Rach, [neither] any of your own nation וְהַגֵּ֖ר <WH1616> ve-hag-Ger nor any stranger הַגָּ֥ר <WH1481> hag-Gar that sojourneth בְּתוֹכְכֶֽם׃ <WH8432> be-toch-Chem. among
